tasks.task_description: Analyze current AWS services detection issues in smart_rate_limit_classifier.py
Enhance get_aws_services() method to parse README content for service mentions
Add GitHub topics extraction to AWS services detection
Implement CloudFormation/CDK file analysis for AWS services
Fix description fallback logic to use README when GitHub description is missing
Create enhanced_classifier.py with improved AWS services and description detection
Test enhanced classifier on sample of 10-20 repositories
Process top 500 starred repositories with enhanced classifier
Validate AWS services detection accuracy on processed repositories
Generate new CSV with specific AWS services instead of 'Multiple'
Add architecture pattern detection (event-driven, API-based, batch processing)
Extract specific use cases and problem statements from README content
Add prerequisites and complexity level analysis
Create validation script to compare old vs new classification quality
Update README.md with enhancement details and new classifier usage

description: AWS GitHub Repository Classification System Enhancement - Fix data quality issues and improve AWS services detection for production-ready agent deployment
context: Successfully pushed enhancement analysis and comprehensive TODO list to GitHub. Files committed: ENHANCEMENT_TODO.md (detailed phased improvement plan) and enhancement analysis document. Ready to start Phase 1 implementation in next session.
Starting Phase 1 implementation - creating enhanced classifier with improved AWS services detection and description fallback

Enhanced classifier V2 successfully tested on 10 repositories. AWS services detection working perfectly - detecting specific services instead of generic 'Multiple'. Ready to process top 500 repositories.
Bug fixes successful! Enhanced classifier V4 achieved 100% success rate on 20-repo test. Fixed None handling issues. Ready to process all 7,552 repositories.
